questionsAndDesiredOutput.statusCheck: Summarize how I’m doing vs. my usual HRV, RHR, and subjective energy/mood baselines. Identify any warning signs of overtraining or under-recovery.
questionsAndDesiredOutput.workoutAdaptation: Based on the data, should I proceed, reduce intensity/volume, or switch to an easier ride/rest? Provide rationale.
questionsAndDesiredOutput.recommendations: Suggest any nutritional, hydration, or additional recovery strategies (e.g., more sleep, foam rolling). Also advise how to adjust the rest of the week’s plan if I’m fatigued or feeling good.
questionsAndDesiredOutput.motivationAndNextSteps: Give a concise plan for today’s ride, plus a short motivational note to keep me aligned with my goals.

formatOfResponse.analysis: Green, Yellow, or Red light regarding current recovery status
formatOfResponse.plan: Clear recommendation for today’s workout (duration, intensity, intervals), any changes for upcoming days
formatOfResponse.tips: Fueling, hydration, or mental prep insights
